key_features: Able to be washed without damage
Brand and weight printed on ends
ai_description: Two vibrant blue hexagonal dumbbells with a textured neoprene-like coating, each weighing 4 KG. The brand name 'KAKSS' and weight designation are printed in clean white text on the flat ends. The dumbbells feature a practical hexagonal shape to prevent rolling, shown both in isolation on a white background and in a gym setting on a speckled grey floor. The coating appears durable and washable, designed for regular fitness use.
manual: Professionally crafted kettlebell made from 100% pure cast iron with no material mixing, delivering long-term durability and accurate weight as per international standards. The smooth, seamless cast-iron handle offers a secure, comfortable grip, while the flat, well-balanced base ensures superior ground stability, controlled movements, and safe strength training for both beginners and advanced athletes
